item.q: This ms. was brought from Abyssinia after the campaign of 1868 by SirJohn Hills, K. C. B., and sold to the Trustees of the British Museum in 1918 by his sister, Mrs Lewis Pugh, late of Abermaed, Cardiganshire, for the benefit of the British Red Cross Society.

msItem.colophon: በአኰትተ፡ አብ፡ ወወልድ፡ ወመንፈስ፡ ቅዱስ፡ ዛቲ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘአጽሐፍክዋ፡ አነ፡ ዮሴፍ፡ ንቡረ፡ እድ፡ ለቤተ፡ መስቀል፡ ዘጕናጕና፡ ከመ፡ ይምሐረኒ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ በመንግሥቱ። According to the colophon the manuscript was commissioned by Yosef, nǝbura ʾǝd of Beta Masqal in Gʷǝnagʷǝna.
